title: Capillary Pressure Data Schema
description: Capillary Pressure defines the fluid distribution within a porous media.  It measures the difference in pressure across the interface between two phases, which are typically oil/water, gas/water or gas/oil.

SamplesAnalysisID.title: Sample Analysis ID
SamplesAnalysisID.description: The OSDU Identifier for this SamplesAnalysis.

SampleID.title: Sample ID
SampleID.description: The OSDU Identifier for the Sample associated with this analysis.

items.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data Item
items.description: A meta data item, which allows the association of named properties or property values to a Unit/Measurement/CRS/Azimuth/Time context.

kind.title: UOM Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, 'Unit' for FrameOfReferenceUOM.

name.title: UOM Unit Symbol
name.description: The unit symbol or name of the unit.

persistableReference.title: UOM Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying the Unit.

unitOfMeasureID.description: SRN to unit of measure reference.

propertyNames.title: UOM Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides Unit context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: CRS Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'CRS' for FrameOfReferenceCRS.

persistableReference.title: CRS Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying the CRS.

propertyNames.title: CRS Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides CRS context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: DateTime Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'DateTime', for FrameOfReferenceDateTime.

name.title: DateTime Name
name.description: The name of the DateTime format and reference.

persistableReference.title: DateTime Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying DateTime reference.

propertyNames.title: DateTime Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides DateTime context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

kind.title: AzimuthReference Reference Kind
kind.description: The kind of reference, constant 'AzimuthReference', for FrameOfReferenceAzimuthReference.

name.title: AzimuthReference Name
name.description: The name of the CRS or the symbol/name of the unit.

persistableReference.title: AzimuthReference Persistable Reference
persistableReference.description: The self-contained, persistable reference string uniquely identifying AzimuthReference.

propertyNames.title: AzimuthReference Property Names
propertyNames.description: The list of property names, to which this meta data item provides AzimuthReference context to. A full path like "StructureA.PropertyB" is required to define a unique context; "data" is omitted since frame-of reference normalization only applies to the data block.

SaturationProcessMethodID.title: Saturation Process Method ID
SaturationProcessMethodID.description: SaturationProcessMethod, intended to be paired with SampleAnalysisType for Capillary Pressure Subfamilies.  e.g. PrimaryDrainage, PrimaryImbibition, SecondaryDrainage, SecondaryImbibition, TertiaryDrainage.

FluidSystemAnalysisTypeID.title: Fluid System Analysis Type ID
FluidSystemAnalysisTypeID.description: Identifier for the Fluid System (e.g. oil-brine) that is present in this sample.

ForcedImbibition.title: Forced Imbibition
ForcedImbibition.description: Array Object containing the test steps for this analysis.

InitialWaterSaturation.title: Initial Water Saturation
InitialWaterSaturation.description: Water Saturation of the sample at initial pressure and temperature conditions.

TestData.title: Test Data
TestData.description: The permeability value acting as a reference for this experiment.

items.title: Test Data
items.description: Array Object containing the test steps for this analysis.

TransientData.title: Transient Data
TransientData.description: Object containing volume measurements over time for centrifuge and porous plate analyses.

items.title: Transient Data
items.description: Object containing volume measurements over time for centrifuge and porous plate analyses.

ProductionProfile.title: Production Profile
ProductionProfile.description: Production of displaced phase as function of time in a centrifuge or porous plate experiment.

Time.title: Time
Time.description: The time at which this production profile value was measured.

RotationalSpeed.title: Rotational Speed
RotationalSpeed.description: The rotational speed of the centrifuge, measured as rotations per minute (RPM) or equivalent.

Permeability.title: Permeability
Permeability.description: Quantifies the ability for fluids or gas to flow through a sample.

Value.title: Value
Value.description: The numeric value of this permeability measurement.

PermeabilityMeasurementTypeID.title: Permeability Measurement Type ID
PermeabilityMeasurementTypeID.description: The OSDU reference-data ID corresponding to the type of permeability being measured.

Porosity.title: Porosity
Porosity.description: The amount of pore space relative to the volume of a sample.

Value.title: Value
Value.description: The numeric value of this porosity measurement.

PorosityMeasurementTypeID.title: Porosity Measurement Type ID
PorosityMeasurementTypeID.description: The OSDU reference-data ID corresponding to the type of porosity being measured.

Pressure.title: Pressure
Pressure.description: The value and unit of measure of the pressure of the sample environment.

Value.title: Value
Value.description: The numeric value of this pressure measurement.

PressureMeasurementTypeID.title: Pressure Measurement Type ID
PressureMeasurementTypeID.description: The OSDU reference-data ID corresponding to the type of pressure being measured.

Temperature.title: Temperature
Temperature.description: The value and unit of measure of the temperature of the sample environment.

InterfacialTension.title: Interfacial Tension
InterfacialTension.description: The force that holds the surface of a particular phase together.

StepNumber.title: Step Number
StepNumber.description: Number assigned to identify this specific step in the sequence of steps of the analysis.

CapillaryPressure.title: Capillary Pressure
CapillaryPressure.description: A measure of the difference in pressure across the interface between two phases, which are typically oil/water, gas/water or gas/oil.

PhaseSaturation.title: Phase Saturation
PhaseSaturation.description: The saturation of the sample for this step.

PhaseInjectedVolume.title: Phase Injected Volume
PhaseInjectedVolume.description: The volume and type of fluid injected into the sample for this step.  This volume is identical to the volume of fluid produced from the sample.

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: Additional notes or observations relevant to the specific test step.

RemarkSequenceNumber.title: Remark Sequence Number
RemarkSequenceNumber.description: A unique identifier for each remark record. This identifier is used to uniquely identify a member in an array of remarks.

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: A descriptive comment for this remark.

RemarkSource.title: Remark Source
RemarkSource.description: The person, vendor, interpreter or other provider of information.

RemarkDate.title: Remark Date
RemarkDate.description: The date the remark was issued.

CalculatedProperties.title: Calculated Properties
CalculatedProperties.description: Object containing calculated properties such as averages, Jfunction, and height above free water level.

PoreThroatRadius.title: Pore Throat Radius
PoreThroatRadius.description: PoreThroatRadius is the conversion of the capillary pressure using interfacial tension and the wettability angle ( PTR = 2 x sigma cos (theta) / Capillary pressure )

PoreThroatMedianRadius.title: Pore Throat Median Radius
PoreThroatMedianRadius.description: This is the P50 (median) of the Pore Throat Radius distribution.

EndFaceEstimationMethodID.title: End Face Estimation Method ID
EndFaceEstimationMethodID.description:
The method used to calculate the end face phase saturation, e.g. HasslerBrunner,
Forbes.

EndFacePhaseSaturation.title: End Face Phase Saturation
EndFacePhaseSaturation.description: Calculated saturation of the end face of the sample in a centrifuge experiment.

JFunction.title: J Function
JFunction.description: Conversion of normalized capillary pressure using porosity and permeability [ J = PC / ( sigma x cos wettability ) x SQRT( permeability / porosity ) ]

CapillaryPressure.title: Capillary Pressure
CapillaryPressure.description: A measure of the difference in pressure across the interface between two phases, which are typically oil/water, gas/water or gas/oil.

NormalizedPermeabilityDistributionFuncti.title: Normalized Permeability Distribution Function
NormalizedPermeabilityDistributionFuncti.description: The computation of a permeability obtained from the contribution of the different pore throats as they are filled during the experiment. related to HPMI or MICP only.

PoreThroatSizeDistribution.title: Pore Throat Size Distribution
PoreThroatSizeDistribution.description: The distribution of pore throat size during the experiment.

MeanHydraulicRadius.title: Mean Hydraulic Radius
MeanHydraulicRadius.description: Term used for for SQRT( permeability / porosity ) which is homogeneous to a length (mD ~ m^2)

CumulativePhaseSaturation.title: Cumulative Phase Saturation
CumulativePhaseSaturation.description: This is the computed saturation for the cumulative volume that is normalized to the volume at the end of the experiment.

PhaseSaturationFrequency.title: Phase Saturation Frequency
PhaseSaturationFrequency.description: This is the frequency plot of the portion of porosity filled at each pressure step.

BondNumber.title: Bond Number
BondNumber.description: A dimensionless number that characterizes the relative importance of gravitational forces to capillary forces within a fluid system.

RotationalSpeed.title: rotational Speed
RotationalSpeed.description: The rotational speed of the centrifuge, measured as rotations per minute (RPM) or equivalent.

StartTime.title: Start Time
StartTime.description: Timestamp at which this step is initiated.

CumulativeIntrusion.title: Cumulative Intrusion
CumulativeIntrusion.description: The accumulated intrusion at this test step, typically reported as mL/gram.

Endpoints.title: Endpoints
Endpoints.description: The type of permeability measurement being used as a reference value for this experiment.

CapillaryPressureMax.title: Capillary Pressure Maximum
CapillaryPressureMax.description: Maximum capillary pressure recorded during the analysis of the sample

PhaseSaturationAtCapillaryPressureMax.title: Phase Saturation At Capillary Pressure Maximum
PhaseSaturationAtCapillaryPressureMax.description: Saturation at the maximum capillary pressure of this phase of the experiment.

LowestPhaseSaturationAvg.title: Lowest Phase Saturation Average
LowestPhaseSaturationAvg.description: Lowest phase saturation achieved averaged over entire core plug or composite, only applicable for centrifuge & coreflood

MinCapPressureRecorded.title: Minimum Capillary Pressure Recorded
MinCapPressureRecorded.description: Minimum pressure from which Sor can be obtained.

ResidualFluidSaturation.title: Residual Fluid Saturation
ResidualFluidSaturation.description: The saturation of residual fluid after forced imbibition or drainage.

EffectivePermeabilityOfResidualFluid.title: Effective Permeability Of Residual Fluid
EffectivePermeabilityOfResidualFluid.description: The effective permeability of the residual fluid at the end of the imbibition or drainage phase.

RelativePermeabilityOfResidualFluid.title: Relative Permeability Of Residual Fluid
RelativePermeabilityOfResidualFluid.description: The relative permeability of the residual fluid at the end of the imbibition or drainage phase.

InjectionFluidID.title: Injection Fluid Type ID
InjectionFluidID.description: The injection fluid used during this phase of the experiment.

SpontaneousImbibition.title: Spontaneous Imbibition
SpontaneousImbibition.description: The fraction of injection fluid imbibed spontaneously prior to forced injection.

WOGnCycleNotationID.title: Water Oil Gas Number ID
WOGnCycleNotationID.description: The WOGn notation description of this capillary pressure cycle.

ForcedDrainage.title: Forced Drainage
ForcedDrainage.description: Array Object containing the test steps for this analysis.

InitialWaterSaturation.title: Initial Water Saturation
InitialWaterSaturation.description: Water Saturation of the sample at initial pressure and temperature conditions.

TestData.title: Test Data
TestData.description: The permeability value acting as a reference for this experiment.

items.title: Test Data
items.description: Array Object containing the test steps for this analysis.

TransientData.title: Transient Data
TransientData.description: Object containing volume measurements over time for centrifuge and porous plate analyses.

items.title: Transient Data
items.description: Object containing volume measurements over time for centrifuge and porous plate analyses.

ProductionProfile.title: Production Profile
ProductionProfile.description: Production of displaced phase as function of time in a centrifuge or porous plate experiment.

Time.title: Time
Time.description: The time at which this production profile value was measured.

RotationalSpeed.title: Rotational Speed
RotationalSpeed.description: The rotational speed of the centrifuge, measured as rotations per minute (RPM) or equivalent.

Permeability.title: Permeability
Permeability.description: Quantifies the ability for fluids or gas to flow through a sample.

Value.title: Value
Value.description: The numeric value of this permeability measurement.

PermeabilityMeasurementTypeID.title: Permeability Measurement Type ID
PermeabilityMeasurementTypeID.description: The OSDU reference-data ID corresponding to the type of permeability being measured.

Porosity.title: Porosity
Porosity.description: The amount of pore space relative to the volume of a sample.

Value.title: Value
Value.description: The numeric value of this porosity measurement.

PorosityMeasurementTypeID.title: Porosity Measurement Type ID
PorosityMeasurementTypeID.description: The OSDU reference-data ID corresponding to the type of porosity being measured.

Pressure.title: Pressure
Pressure.description: The value and unit of measure of the pressure of the sample environment.

Value.title: Value
Value.description: The numeric value of this pressure measurement.

PressureMeasurementTypeID.title: Pressure Measurement Type ID
PressureMeasurementTypeID.description: The OSDU reference-data ID corresponding to the type of pressure being measured.

Temperature.title: Temperature
Temperature.description: The value and unit of measure of the temperature of the sample environment.

InterfacialTension.title: Interfacial Tension
InterfacialTension.description: The force that holds the surface of a particular phase together.

StepNumber.title: Step Number
StepNumber.description: Number assigned to identify this specific step in the sequence of steps of the analysis.

CapillaryPressure.title: Capillary Pressure
CapillaryPressure.description: A measure of the difference in pressure across the interface between two phases, which are typically oil/water, gas/water or gas/oil.

PhaseSaturation.title: Phase Saturation
PhaseSaturation.description: The saturation of the sample for this step.

PhaseInjectedVolume.title: Phase Injected Volume
PhaseInjectedVolume.description: The volume and type of fluid injected into the sample for this step.  This volume is identical to the volume of fluid produced from the sample.

RemarkSequenceNumber.description: A unique identifier for each remark record. This identifier is used to uniquely identify a member in an array of remarks.

Remark.description: A descriptive comment for this remark.

RemarkSource.description: The person, vendor, interpreter or other provider of information.

RemarkDate.description: The date the remark was issued.

CalculatedProperties.description: Object containing calculated properties such as averages, Jfunction, and height above free water level.

PoreThroatRadius.title: Pore Throat Radius
PoreThroatRadius.description: PoreThroatRadius is the conversion of the capillary pressure using interfacial tension and the wettability angle ( PTR = 2 x sigma cos (theta) / Capillary pressure )

PoreThroatMedianRadius.description: This is the P50 (median) of the Pore Throat Radius distribution.

EndFaceEstimationMethodID.description:
The method used to calculate the end face phase saturation, e.g. HasslerBrunner,
Forbes.

EndFacePhaseSaturation.description: Calculated saturation of the end face of the sample in a centrifuge experiment.

JFunction.title: J Function
JFunction.description: Conversion of normalized capillary pressure using porosity and permeability [ J = PC / ( sigma x cos wettability ) x SQRT( permeability / porosity ) ]

CapillaryPressure.title: Capillary Pressure
CapillaryPressure.description: A measure of the difference in pressure across the interface between two phases, which are typically oil/water, gas/water or gas/oil.

NormalizedPermeabilityDistributionFuncti.title: Normalized Permeability Distribution Function
NormalizedPermeabilityDistributionFuncti.description: The computation of a permeability obtained from the contribution of the different pore throats as they are filled during the experiment. related to HPMI or MICP only.

PoreThroatSizeDistribution.title: Pore Throat Size Distribution
PoreThroatSizeDistribution.description: The distribution of pore throat size during the experiment.

MeanHydraulicRadius.title: Mean Hydraulic Radius
MeanHydraulicRadius.description: Term used for for SQRT( permeability / porosity ) which is homogeneous to a length (mD ~ m^2)

CumulativePhaseSaturation.title: Cumulative Phase Saturation
CumulativePhaseSaturation.description: This is the computed saturation for the cumulative volume that is normalized to the volume at the end of the experiment.

PhaseSaturationFrequency.title: Phase Saturation Frequency
PhaseSaturationFrequency.description: This is the frequency plot of the portion of porosity filled at each pressure step.

BondNumber.title: Bond Number
BondNumber.description: A dimensionless number that characterizes the relative importance of gravitational forces to capillary forces within a fluid system.

RotationalSpeed.title: rotational Speed
RotationalSpeed.description: The rotational speed of the centrifuge, measured as rotations per minute (RPM) or equivalent.

StartTime.title: Start Time
StartTime.description: Timestamp at which this step is initiated.

CumulativeIntrusion.title: Cumulative Intrusion
CumulativeIntrusion.description: The accumulated intrusion at this test step, typically reported as mL/gram.

Endpoints.title: Endpoints
Endpoints.description: The type of permeability measurement being used as a reference value for this experiment.

CapillaryPressureMax.title: Capillary Pressure Maximum
CapillaryPressureMax.description: Maximum capillary pressure recorded during the analysis of the sample

PhaseSaturationAtCapillaryPressureMax.title: Phase Saturation At Capillary Pressure Maximum
PhaseSaturationAtCapillaryPressureMax.description: Saturation at the maximum capillary pressure of this phase of the experiment.

LowestPhaseSaturationAvg.title: Lowest Phase Saturation Average
LowestPhaseSaturationAvg.description: Lowest phase saturation achieved averaged over entire core plug or composite, only applicable for centrifuge & coreflood

MinCapPressureRecorded.title: Minimum Capillary Pressure Recorded
MinCapPressureRecorded.description: Minimum pressure from which Sor can be obtained.

ResidualFluidSaturation.title: Residual Fluid Saturation
ResidualFluidSaturation.description: The saturation of residual fluid after forced imbibition or drainage.

EffectivePermeabilityOfResidualFluid.title: Effective Permeability Of Residual Fluid
EffectivePermeabilityOfResidualFluid.description: The effective permeability of the residual fluid at the end of the imbibition or drainage phase.

RelativePermeabilityOfResidualFluid.title: Relative Permeability Of Residual Fluid
RelativePermeabilityOfResidualFluid.description: The relative permeability of the residual fluid at the end of the imbibition or drainage phase.

InjectionFluidID.title: Injection Fluid Type ID
InjectionFluidID.description: The injection fluid used during this phase of the experiment.

SpontaneousImbibition.title: Spontaneous Imbibition
SpontaneousImbibition.description: The fraction of injection fluid imbibed spontaneously prior to forced injection.

WOGnCycleNotationID.title: Water Oil Gas Number Cycle Notation ID
WOGnCycleNotationID.description: The WOGn notation description of this capillary pressure cycle.

InitialOilSaturation.title: Initial Oil Saturation
InitialOilSaturation.description: Oil Saturation of the sample at initial pressure and temperature conditions.

InitialGasSaturation.title: Initial Gas Saturation
InitialGasSaturation.description: Gas Saturation of the sample at initial pressure and temperature conditions.

BrineSalinity.title: Brine Salinity
BrineSalinity.description: The concentration of salt within brine which may be called saturant or saturant brine.

InitialConditions.title: Initial Conditions
InitialConditions.description: The pressure and temperature condition of the sample when the secondary phase is introduced.

Pressure.title: Pressure
Pressure.description: The recorded absolute pressure condition. The unit of measure context is defined via meta[] in the Storage record while the Search responses return the value in base SI unit Pa (Pascal).

Temperature.title: Temperature
Temperature.description: The recorded temperature condition. The unit of measure context is defined via meta[] in the Storage record while the Search responses return the value in base SI unit K (Kelvin).

IsStandardConditions.title: Is Standard Conditions
IsStandardConditions.description:
To capture when Measurement have been made at Standard Conditions (25°C / 100 kPa)
Mutually Exclusive with Pressure/Temperature.
Capture

NonStandardConditionsReference.title: Non Standard Conditions Reference
NonStandardConditionsReference.description: Open Text Box to capture the P & T Reference when measurements are made at non standard conditions (such as "Reservoir", "Tank",…)

AppliedOverBurdenStress.title: Applied Over Burden Stress
AppliedOverBurdenStress.description: Pressure applied on the sample with sleeve(s) prior to the capillary pressure experiment, also known as Net Overburden Pressure (NOBP), or Net confining stress (NCS).

DesaturationMethodID.title: Desaturation Method ID
DesaturationMethodID.description: The method by which the sample was desaturated.

MeanDistanceImbibition.title: Mean Distance Imbibition
MeanDistanceImbibition.description: The average length of the arm of the centrifuge for the imbibition phase of the experiment.

MeanDistanceDrainage.title: Mean Distance Drainage
MeanDistanceDrainage.description: The average length of the arm of the centrifuge for the drainage phase of the experiment.

ReferencePermeability.title: Reference Permeability
ReferencePermeability.description: e.g. gas permeability kg, gas permeability at minimum liquid saturation kg@Slmin, oil permeability ko, water permeability kw, etc

items.title: Reference Permeability
items.description: e.g. gas permeability kg, gas permeability at minimum liquid saturation kg@Slmin, oil permeability ko, water permeability kw, etc

Value.title: Value
Value.description: The permeability value acting as a reference for this experiment.

PermeabilityMeasurementTypeID.title: Permeability Measurement Type ID
PermeabilityMeasurementTypeID.description: The type of permeability measurement being used as a reference value for this experiment.

WaterViscosity.title: Water Viscosity
WaterViscosity.description: A measure of the water's internal resistance to flow.

WaterDensity.title: Water Density
WaterDensity.description: The mass per volume of water in the sample.

OilViscosity.title: Oil Viscosity
OilViscosity.description: A measure of the oil’s internal resistance to flow.

OilDensity.title: Oil Density
OilDensity.description: The mass per volume of oil in the sample.

GasViscosity.title: Gas Viscosity
GasViscosity.description: A measure of the gas’s internal resistance to flow.

GasDensity.title: Gas Density
GasDensity.description: The mass per volume of gas in the sample.

OilTypeID.title: Oil Type ID
OilTypeID.description: Identifies the type of oil used in the experiment.

GasTypeID.title: Gas Type ID
GasTypeID.description: Identifies the type of gas used in the experiment.

WaterTypeID.title: Water Type ID
WaterTypeID.description: Identifies the type of gas used in the experiment.
